Public Interface IAuthorizationHeaderProvider2 Implements IAuthorizationHeaderProvider(Of OperationResult(Of AuthorizationHeaderInformation, AuthorizationHeaderError))

Docs.summary: Creates an authorization header value that the caller can use to access a protected web API, which supports either unbound or bound to a certificate (for example, in an mTLS PoP scenario) tokens.
